attribute_tooltips.description: The ability to think intelligently. A high Mind stat allows a hearthling to exceed in complex mental tasks. Influences Diligence, Curiosity, Inventiveness.
Competence at physical activities. Hearthlings with a high Body stat will move faster. Influences Muscle, Speed, Stamina.
Faith in other people. A high Spirit hearthling will easily befriend others and stand strong against enemies. Influences Courage, Willpower, Compassion.
This hearthling's concentration. Diligent workers complete long tasks without getting distracted.
How much this hearthling enjoys new experiences.
How good this hearthling is at creating things. Good inventors are more likely to create fine craftables.
This hearthling's brawn. Contributes to damage in combat.
How long this hearthling can work before needing rest.
How brave this hearthling is in the face of combat. Less courageous hearthlings are liable to flee from enemies.
How likely this hearthling is to resist enemy charms.
How likely this hearthling will help out a fellow villager or befriend others.

score_tooltips.description: The gold value of everything in the town's inventory.
How happy your citizens are overall. Aim for 10!
How your citizens feel about the town's food situation. Is there enough to eat? Try to obtain variety of foods!
How your citizens feel about their lodging situation. Are there beds to sleep in?
How your citizens feel about the town's security. Is the town well protected or getting pillaged by goblins?
